Deploying and Managing Windows with code!¶

Why are you here?¶

Tired of limitations of the Windows GUI? Want to work more efficiently? After years of saying ‘I’m not a developer,’ this documentation is my guide on how to get started with Git, Chocolatey, and Puppet.
